name: The Garden Of Surreal Dreams
description:
The brand new album by Gary Hunter is called "The Garden Of Surreal Dreams" a collection of 11 original compositions. "The Garden Of Surreal Dreams is best described as an Electronic Chill Out album which is very thought provoking and relaxing. Gary's influences for this album are Jean Michel Jarre, OMD, Moby and John Foxx (Cathedral Oceans albums). The album was recorded during 2011 and early 2012. You can hear tracks from the album via the link below:
http://soundcloud.com/gary-hunter There is also a special website for the album:
http://www.thegardenofsurrealdreams.moonfruit.com The album is also available as a digital download with a bonus track and an interview via the link below:
http://garyhunter.bandcamp.com/album/the-garden-of-surreal-dreams

name: Chill Factor 1
description:
Chill Factor 1 Is a collection of extended remixes of 6 tracks taken from the albums "Paradise Island & "Beyond The Storm"

Samples of the tracks can be found on my Web Page: Gary Hunter Official Home Page

Track Listing

01. Standing By The River (12 Inch Mix) 02. Cast A Shadow (Street Style Mix) 03. Sometimes Sad (Extended Mix) 04. Thinking Of You (2 AM Melody Mix) 05. Asleep (Extended Dream Mix) 06. Nightlife (After Hours Mix)

P&P Worldwide £1.00

name: Chill Factor 2
description:
Chill Factor 2 is the second remix album with a further 6 extended remixes of tracks taken off the albums "Beyond The Storm" and "Paradise Island".

Samples of the tracks can be found on my Web Page: Gary Hunter Official Home Page

Track Listing

01. Cry (2003 Extended Mix) 02. Love The Beauty (Valentine Mix) 03. Street Cafe (Coffee Club Mix) 04. October Sky (Autumn Mix) 05. Second Chance (12 Inch Mix) 06. On The Beach (Paradise Mix)

P&P Worldwide £1.00
